TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DueDate extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates when payments are due when calling financial methods.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you call financial functions, you can use enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
The `DueDate` enumeration defines constants used to identify when payments are due.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate BegOfPeriod = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Falls at the beginning of the date interval

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate EndOfPeriod = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Falls at the end of the date interval
